name: mri_extract
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: MRI data extraction tool for FreeSurfer

inputs.description: Extract region like the given template volume.
inputs.name: Template Volume

inputs.description: Source MRI volume file from which data will be extracted.
inputs.name: Source Volume

inputs.description: The destination file where the extracted data will be saved.
inputs.name: Destination Volume

inputs.description: Coordinates and size of the extraction box: x0 y0 z0 dx dy dz.
inputs.name: Extraction Coordinates

output-files.description: Output file with extracted MRI data.
output-files.name: Output Extracted Volume
